name: Batoto Soothing Dark 2.0
description:
Dark Version of Batoto. (Sylo)

Very comfortable to read with.
Hides ads and pretty much all the clutter.

Check the 2 preview images to get an impression.

user.name: Nihagi
user.about:
Yo, I'm just your average 28 year old who finds some fun in making styles now and then.

If you happen to like any of the styles I made, feel free to voice it.

If you got a site you want me to style for you, I might not be the right person to ask.
I'm extremely lazy and only do whatever I feel for in the moment.
But if that wont hold you back, feel free to ask me the favor.

Cheers~

additional_info:
Chrome might have a few lacking areas on the forum. (mainly when replying in topics or commenting on manga pages)
Everything should be fine on FireFox.

Should you come across something that bothers you, please feel free to tell.
You can contact me about the style here https://forum.userstyles.org/post/discussion?Discussion/StyleID=68671

Old version of Batoto Soothing Dark for (Sylo) can be found at https://userstyles.org/styles/104919/batoto-soothing-dark-1-0
Tho it will not be updated. (Not that it ever was getting updated before)
